i look up for a split second and bam ! there it is , it originated from with in the big dipper , i clearly looked at the big dipper wich is right over head in the sky at this time of year and at this time of night 930 10 pm . this realy bright craft illuminated as if it was coming directly down from with in the big dipper . it looked like a star at first but then it obviously got coser to earth , it entered the atmosphere actualy that is how bright this craft got . after diving in it slowly traveled south heading for providence the main city in ri . it was a brief encounter only a couple of minutes long , after it reached over head the city it gradually inclined back upward into space. i followed it the whole way, how could anyone miss this thing. the glow of the craft slowly faded as it returned into space and it dissapeared into the blackness of space. this isnt the only encounter that has ocured in my town and state i have witnessed countless craft in the sky some more amazing then others but still as exciting , you just have to take the time to look up !!
